table_caption: Letter accuracy measurements. Mean ± Standard Deviation of behavioral scores in trained items before and after intervention and the pre-post changes are reported for each treatment group. P-values from one sample t-tests for changes within treatment groups are listed in the rows labeled “P-values for changes”. Mean and 95% confidence interval of additional gain for tDCS over sham are reported in the fourth column. P-values from Welch two sample t-tests for additional gain of tDCS over sham are listed in the fifth column.
